title: Spotify cries foul over Apple’s app review process
description:
Spotify has accused Apple of deliberately holding back approval for an updated version of its iOS app, claiming the tech giant is failing to comply with the European Union’s new Digital Markets Act (DMA) regulations. The music streaming giant submitted an updated app to Apple’s App Store on March 5th, just days before the DMA... Read more »

The post Spotify cries foul over Apple’s app review process appeared first on Developer Tech News.
